resources.string: This app only works with Android versions 6.0 or higher.
Error reading file. Please give all the permissions an restart the app.
All the permissions are needed to use this app.
Wait until acquisition is done.\nPlease, do not move.
We are calibrating the data.\nPlease, do not move.
Choose the time of the acquisition:
Choose the setting of the flash:
Choose the color of the chart:
Cover all the camera with your fingertip.\nPress Continue when you are done.
The acquisition is complete.\nYou can see the result in the chart.
Press the Play button to start

1. Press the Play button to start.

2. Cover and press all the camera with your fingertip, you do not need to cover the flash, but your fingertip needs to be lit. You can see a preview on the screen.

3. Press continue.

4. Please, remember to not move until the acquisition ends.

5. Please wait until some settings are made.

6. When the acquisition starts, you could see a chart with the remaining time until the acquisition ends.

6.5. You can stop the acquisition at any time, but you will not get any results after that.

7. When the acquisition ends, the camera will stop the recording and a chart with your PPG signal and all the metrics will be shown.

8. After that, you can review and save your data or return to the main menu.

8.5. If you return to the main menu, you need to change the settings again.

1. If you press the Settings button, you can change some settings of the acquisition.

2. You can change the time of the acquisition, the default setting is 15 seconds.

3. You can change the color of the chart, the default setting is Blue.

4. You can turn On/Off the flash of the camera, the default setting is On.

1. Please do not move during the acquisition.

2. If it is possible, make the acquisition in an environment without changes in light. 

3. For better results, try to make the acquisition while you are sitting, putting your finger in a flat surface without pushing it in the surface.

4. If you do not follow the instructions or warnings, it could lead to errors in the acquisition.

5. If you detected any high interference (movement or light) in the signal, please take the acquisition again and do not save the acquisition.

6. Note that the PPG signal can contain a small amount of noise, this does not mean that the results are wrong, it could be the light environment or small movement noise, and it is filtered when the signal is calculated.

7. The Blood Pressure is calculated with Deep Learning, and the model it is still on progress, so it could have some error.
